name: Ten 4-unit upper-division courses (40 units) as specified below:

child.name: One course (numbered 100-193) selected from each of the three departments—Criminology, Law and Society; Urban Planning and Public Policy; and Psychological Science
(b) B. Seven additional 4-unit upper-division courses (28 units)

Courses numbered 100-193 selected from Social Ecology or the departments of Criminology, Law and Society; Urban Planning and Public Policy; and Psychological Science. Course prerequisites established by the individual departments must be satisfied.
